attributes.action: change the law regarding the supply of draught beer,  making it real a pint measure as in any other fluid.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
being that the price of a pint of beer is around the three pound mark, i propose the law be changed, that the pint should be sold in pubs in marked glasses, is this the only measurement in the u.k which is not a true measure.
         mr r fenwick
